title: Holiday Lights in PDX
name: Holiday Lights in PDX
description:
A Map by Willametteweek

A reader wrote WW to ask if we had a list of awesome local light displays. The answer was no. So we're enlisting your help to build a mega-map of the best places to check out holiday lights in Portland. Add your favorites!

properties.name: Christmas Fantasy Trail
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek19754 South Ridge RoadDEC. 7–29 19754 South Ridge Road, Oregon City, 631-2047. 6 pm-9 pm. .50-.

properties.name: Christmas Festival of Lights
properties.description: Posted by WillametteweekNOV. 23–DEC. 30 The Grotto, 8840 NE Skidmore St., 261-2400. 5 pm. -.

properties.name: Christmas Ship Parade
properties.description: Posted by Willametteweek Christmas Ship Parade DEC. 7–20 Visit christmasships.org for various locations and departure times.

properties.description: Posted by WillametteweekOpen 6 pm-11 pm Dec. 15–31. Free. Read our Q&A with Peacock Lane\'s president here: http://wweek.com/editorial/3405/10096/
